General.Name: Amlogic Shanghai Co Ltd
General.Description: Amlogic (Shanghai) Co.,Ltd., a fabless semiconductor company, engages in the design, development, and sale of system-level SoC chips and peripheral chips. The company's products are used in smart set-top boxes, TV, vision, home, speakers, and digital signage products. The company was founded in 2002 and is based in Pudong, China.
General.Address: E5, No.2555 XiuPu Road, Pudong, China, 200233
